Talent_Statement_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Talent_Statement_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Talent_Statement_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Response element containing a reference to the Talent Statement Type that was created or edited.

Talent_Statement_Type_Data.description: A unique identifier for the Talent Statement Type.
The name of the Talent Statement Type.
A description of the Talent Statement Type.
Whether or not the Talent Statement Type should be displayed on the professional profile.
Whether or not the Talent Statement Type is currently active.
Whether or not the Talent Statement Type is currently being used.

description: Data element for the current Talent Statement Type.

validation.validation: You can't inactivate a talent statement type displayed on the professional profile.
Talent System Type Name field must be unique.
You can't edit the Name of a Talent System Type that is in use.
Talent Statement Type Name field is required.
You can't delete a Talent Statement Type that is in use.

description: Delete flag to indicate request to delete the reference Talent Statement Type passed.
